1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Anas bin Malik that:A Bedouin urinated in the mosque, and some of the people rushed at him. The Messenger of Allah said: "Do not interrupt him." Then he called for a bucket of water and poured it over (the urine)

chapter.ara-name: باب الأَرْضُ يُصِيبُهَا الْبَوْلُ كَيْفَ تُغْسَلُ
chapter.eng-name: Ground that is soiled with urine and how it should be washed
